results.title: The Gift
results.creator_credit: Jodine Stodart, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In 2005, Jodine Stodart travelled to Oxfam Australia to India. It was there that she met a unique lady, not much older than herself, that would leave a lasting impression on the young traveller.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jodine Stodart, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: In recognition
results.creator_credit: Gerald Ashcroft, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘Capturing the light and being in the moment, what more could you ask for?’ Gerald Ashcroft’s mother talked him out of giving up piano with a garden hoe. Many years on, he is grateful for that, as he is for his two beautiful daughters.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gerald Ashcroft, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Three cows
results.creator_credit: Gavin Bannerman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Gavin Bannerman grew up on a farm out of Brisbane. The Bannermans had a deal with the local butcher for their cattle and every season they would either have a fridge full of meat or a tidy sum. One day, they decided to name their cows.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gavin Bannerman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Gavin Bannerman grew up on a farm out of Brisbane. The Bannermans had a deal with the local butcher for their cattle and every season they would either have a fridge full of meat or a tidy sum. One day, they decided to name their cows.

results.title: Old white ute
results.creator_credit: David Kelly, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When he was young, David Kelly witnessed an image that would stay with him for many years and bear itself out in a way that Kelly could not have envisaged.

results.title: My dad
results.creator_credit: Fan Chen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In China where they lived in rather poor conditions, Fan Chen’s father worked hard to support his family and provide a better life for them, eventually making the move to Australia in 2006. This story is a ‘thank you’ from his admiring son.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fan Chen, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Gia mas (About us)
results.creator_credit: Parthena Savvidou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: After her mother left, Parthena Savvidou and her father fled to Greece to live with Parthena’s grandparents for six years before their eventual return to Australia. This story is about Parthena’s memories of life in Greece and her special relationship with her father. A thank you from a daughter to her father.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Parthena Savvidou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: After her mother left, Parthena Savvidou and her father fled to Greece to live with Parthena’s grandparents for six years before their eventual return to Australia. This story is about Parthena’s memories of life in Greece and her special relationship with her father. A thank you from a daughter to her father.
